text: Larkin Smith (17571813) was a Virginia politician. He represented King and Queen County in the Virginia House of Delegates, and served as that body's Speaker from 1799 until 1802. ==References== *List of former Speakers of the House of Delegates, in the old House chamber in the Virginia State Capitol Category:1750s births Category:1813 deaths Category:Members of the Virginia House of Delegates Category:Speakers of the Virginia House of Delegates Category:People from King and Queen County, Virginia Category:Virginia colonial people
title: Larkin Smith (Virginia politician)
